_comment: Test fixture for invalid version format error (non-numeric components). Tests that all version components must be numeric integers (no pre-release or build metadata). Git state required: Any valid git state (error occurs before git operations). Expected outcome: Workflow should FAIL at version format validation with error message: 'Version must be in semantic versioning format (e.g., 1.0.0, 2.1.3)', should not proceed to release creation. Setup: Any git state is acceptable for this test.
